actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Motion to Table Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 236 - 155 (Record Vote No: 10).

official_title: A resolution directing the House Committee on Rules to undertake an investigation concerning the matter of proxy voting.

summary.text: Directs the House Committee on Rules to undertake an investigation concerning the matter of proxy voting and to determine whether procedures eliminating proxy voting should be established. Requires the Committee to report to the House with recommendations on how to ensure the accuracy of official House records and documents and the integrity of House committees.

titles.title: A resolution directing the House Committee on Rules to undertake an investigation concerning the matter of proxy voting.
